function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased volume of infectious waste due to COVID-19 precautions in hospitals","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Proper sterilization procedures for general waste category","Technologies":"Thermal, microwave, and bio-chemical sterilization","People":"Hospital staff and waste management personnel","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"In-house transmission of the virus due to poor-quality housing and energy-inefficient homes","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases within households","Mitigation":"Improving housing quality and access to sanitation amenities","Technologies":"Renovation and construction technologies for energy-efficient and quality housing","People":"Residents of poor-quality housing","Owner":"Government and housing authorities"},{"Description":"Prevalence of poor-quality buildings and inadequate access to sanitation amenities in poorer countries","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and environmental contamination in impoverished communities","Mitigation":"Improving building quality and providing access to sanitation amenities","Technologies":"Construction and infrastructure development technologies","People":"Residents of impoverished communities","Owner":"Government and international aid organizations"}]}
